com.broudy.gcm.control.services.renderings

Class RenderingsStyler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.control.services.renderings.RenderingsStyler

  • public class RenderingsStyler
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience class that offers useful methods that change renderings' visuals.

    Created on the 8th of June, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy

      • getDropShadow

      • prepareEnhancedTextInputControl

        public static javafx.beans.property.StringProperty prepareEnhancedTextInputControl(javafx.scene.layout.Pane container,
                                                                                   javafx.scene.control.TextInputControl textInputControl,
                                                                                   de.jensd.fx.glyphs.GlyphIcon glyphIcon,
                                                                                   java.lang.String notEmptyColor,
                                                                                   java.lang.String focusedColor,
                                                                                   java.lang.String unfocusedColor)
        Goes through all the necessary steps to initialize an EnhancedTextField. EnhancedTextField is built from a Pane (preferably an HBox), a TextInputControl & a GlyphIcon.

        Important! CSS file must contain classes whose names are a concatenation of this class's constant strings ICON_STYLE_CLASS, ICON_STYLE_CLASS and the passed colors.

        Parameters:
        container - a Pane which has the capability of holding more than 1 component.
        textInputControl - the TextField.
        glyphIcon - an icon (de.jensd.fx.glyphs) by Jens Deters.
        notEmptyColor - the color to be applied when the TextField is not empty.
        focusedColor - the color to be applied when the TextField is empty but focused.
        unfocusedColor - the color to be applied when the TextField is empty and unfocused.
        Returns:
        StringProperty that must be stored in order to keep the binding active.

      • createIconStyleClassBindings

        private static javafx.beans.property.StringProperty createIconStyleClassBindings(javafx.scene.control.TextInputControl textInputControl,
                                                                                 java.lang.String notEmptyColor,
                                                                                 java.lang.String focusedColor,
                                                                                 java.lang.String unfocusedColor)
        Creates a StringBinding that matches the correct icon's style class based on passed colors.
        Parameters:
        textInputControl - the control which the stringProperty is dependent on.
        notEmptyColor - the color to apply when the textInputControl is not empty.
        focusedColor - the color to apply when the textInputControl empty & focused.
        unfocusedColor - the color to apply when the textInputControl empty & unfocused.

      • createIconColorsSwitcheroo

        private static void createIconColorsSwitcheroo(javafx.beans.property.StringProperty iconStyleClass,
                                               de.jensd.fx.glyphs.GlyphIcon fieldIcon)
        Adds a listener that keeps the passed icon's style classes in sync with the iconStyleClass.
        Parameters:
        iconStyleClass - the StringProperty to set.
        fieldIcon - the icon to add the listener to.

      • createContainerColorsSwitcheroo

        private static void createContainerColorsSwitcheroo(javafx.scene.layout.Pane container,
                                                    javafx.scene.control.TextInputControl textInputControl,
                                                    java.lang.String focusedColor,
                                                    java.lang.String unfocusedColor)
        Adds a listener that sets the right colors to the passed container.
        Parameters:
        container - HBox to alter its color.
        textInputControl - the TextField the HBox's color is dependant on.

      • toggleDisableProperty

        public static void toggleDisableProperty(boolean disable,
                                         javafx.scene.Node... nodes)
        Convenience method. Disables or enables all passed nodes.
        Parameters:
        disable - true to disable, false to enable.
        nodes - nodes to toggle their disable property.
